trans-unit.source: Divine Verdict
trans-unit.target: 明圣裁定

trans-unit.resname: W17·1 | Divine Verdict | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Destroy target attacking or blocking creature.
trans-unit.target: 消灭目标进行攻击或阻挡的生物。

trans-unit.source: "Guilty."
trans-unit.target: 「有罪。」

trans-unit.source: Glory Seeker
trans-unit.target: 荣耀追求者

trans-unit.source: "There's no contract to sign, no oath to swear. The enlistment procedure is to unsheathe your sword and point it at the enemy."
trans-unit.target: 「你不用签署合约、订立誓言。征兵程序只是拔出剑来指向敌人。」

trans-unit.source: Serra Angel
trans-unit.target: 撒拉天使

trans-unit.resname: W17·3 | Serra Angel | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)\nVigilance (Attacking doesn't cause this creature to tap.)
trans-unit.target: 飞行（此生物只能被具飞行或延势异能的生物阻挡。） 警戒（此生物攻击时不需横置。）

trans-unit.source: Follow the light. In its absence, follow her.
trans-unit.target: 跟随明光。若置身黑暗，就跟随她。

trans-unit.source: Standing Troops
trans-unit.target: 常驻军队

trans-unit.resname: W17·4 | Standing Troops | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Vigilance (Attacking doesn't cause this creature to tap.)
trans-unit.target: 警戒（此生物攻击时不需横置。）

trans-unit.source: "Bant sentries were called the Angel Line. They never faltered, and they were ready to die defending their position."\n—Elspeth Tirel
trans-unit.target: 「班特哨兵团人称天使防线。他们从不动摇，誓死坚守阵地。」 ～艾紫培提瑞

trans-unit.source: Stormfront Pegasus
trans-unit.target: 暴锋飞马

trans-unit.resname: W17·5 | Stormfront Pegasus | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
trans-unit.target: 飞行（此生物只能被具飞行或延势异能的生物阻挡。）

trans-unit.source: Its hooves touch the earth only when a hero must rise.
trans-unit.target: 当勇士必须翱翔时，它才会驻足土地。

trans-unit.source: Victory's Herald
trans-unit.target: 胜利传令使

trans-unit.resname: W17·6 | Victory's Herald | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)\nWhenever CARDNAME attacks, attacking creatures gain flying and lifelink until end of turn. (Damage dealt by those creatures also causes you to gain that much life.)
trans-unit.target: 飞行（此生物只能被具飞行或延势异能的生物阻挡。） 每当CARDNAME攻击时，进行攻击的生物获得飞行与系命异能直到回合结束。（那些生物所造成的伤害会让你得到等量的生命。）

trans-unit.source: Air Elemental
trans-unit.target: 大气元素

trans-unit.resname: W17·7 | Air Elemental | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
trans-unit.target: 飞行（此生物只能被具飞行或延势异能的生物阻挡。）

trans-unit.source: Pray that it doesn't seek the safety of your lungs.
trans-unit.target: 祈祷它不会突然关心起你的肺部健康。

trans-unit.source: Coral Merfolk
trans-unit.target: 珊瑚人鱼

trans-unit.source: Merfolk are best known for their subtle magic. But those who try to fight them in their own territory quickly realize that merfolk are hardly defenseless on the field of battle.
trans-unit.target: 人鱼一向以精巧的法术闻名。不过在他们地盘与之战斗的人，很快就会发现人鱼在战场上可绝不文弱。

trans-unit.source: Drag Under
trans-unit.target: 拖入汪洋

trans-unit.resname: W17·9 | Drag Under | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Return target creature to its owner's hand.\nDraw a card.
trans-unit.target: 将目标生物移回其拥有者手上。 抓一张牌。

trans-unit.source: Some took to their boats to escape the unfolding nightmare. The remains of their vessels now litter the shores of Nephalia.
trans-unit.target: 有些人驾船逃离日愈加剧的恶梦。那些船的残骸如今散落在涅非利亚海岸边。

trans-unit.source: Inspiration
trans-unit.target: 突发奇想

trans-unit.source: Target player draws two cards.
trans-unit.target: 目标牌手抓两张牌。

trans-unit.source: "Day 31: I finally succeeded in my time reversal experiment!\n"Day 30: I might have a problem here."\n—Journal of the Prime Izmagnus
trans-unit.target: 「第31日：我的逆转时间实验终于成功了！ 「第30日：这下麻烦了。」 ～伊捷首法师的日记

trans-unit.source: Sleep Paralysis
trans-unit.target: 睡眠瘫痪症

trans-unit.resname: W17·11 | Sleep Paralysis | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Enchant creature\nWhen CARDNAME enters the battlefield, tap enchanted creature.\nEnchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.
trans-unit.target: 结附于生物 当CARDNAME进战场时，横置所结附的生物。 所结附的生物于其操控者的重置步骤中不能重置。

trans-unit.resname: W17·12 | Sphinx of Magosi | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Sphinx of Magosi
trans-unit.target: 马格西史芬斯

trans-unit.resname: W17·12 | Sphinx of Magosi | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)\n{2}{U}: Draw a card, then put a +1/+1 counter on CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: 飞行（此生物只能被具飞行或延势异能的生物阻挡。） {2}{U}：抓一张牌，然后在CARDNAME上放置一个+1/+1指示物。

trans-unit.resname: W17·12 | Sphinx of Magosi | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "A riddle is nothing more than a trap for small minds, baited with the promise of understanding."
trans-unit.target: 「谜语只不过是对付卑微心灵的陷阱，以终能理解的承诺为诱饵。」

trans-unit.resname: W17·13 | Stealer of Secrets | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Stealer of Secrets
trans-unit.target: 刺探客

trans-unit.resname: W17·13 | Stealer of Secrets | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME deals combat damage to a player, draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 每当CARDNAME对任一牌手造成战斗伤害时，抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: W17·13 | Stealer of Secrets | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The Dimir would hire her, if only they knew where she lived. The Azorius would condemn her, if only they knew her name.
trans-unit.target: 底密尔想雇用她，但她来去无踪。俄佐立想判决她，但她往来无名。

trans-unit.resname: W17·14 | Tricks of the Trade | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Tricks of the Trade
trans-unit.target: 行业诀窍

trans-unit.resname: W17·14 | Tricks of the Trade | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Enchant creature\nEnchanted creature gets +2/+0 and can't be blocked.
trans-unit.target: 结附于生物 所结附的生物得+2/+0且不能被阻挡。

trans-unit.resname: W17·14 | Tricks of the Trade | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Pathetic. You might as well have protected your treasures with a paper box and some string."
trans-unit.target: 「真没用。你还不如用纸箱和细绳来保护你的珍宝。」

trans-unit.source: Bloodhunter Bat
trans-unit.target: 血猎蝙蝠

trans-unit.resname: W17·15 | Bloodhunter Bat | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)\nWhen CARDNAME enters the battlefield, target player loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.
trans-unit.target: 飞行（此生物只能被具飞行或延势异能的生物阻挡。） 当CARDNAME进战场时，目标牌手失去2点生命且你获得2点生命。

trans-unit.source: It returns eager to share the feast of blood and gore with its ghoulish master.
trans-unit.target: 他急着回来与其阴森主子共享鲜血与血块的大餐。

trans-unit.source: Certain Death
trans-unit.target: 必死无疑

trans-unit.resname: W17·16 | Certain Death | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Destroy target creature. Its controller loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.
trans-unit.target: 消灭目标生物。其操控者失去2点生命且你获得2点生命。

trans-unit.source: Some spirits cling to one person, feasting on the growing fear until a final moment of all-consuming terror.
trans-unit.target: 有些鬼魂会紧缠一人，以其日渐增长的恐惧为食，直到吞噬一切的终极恐怖来临。

trans-unit.source: Nightmare
trans-unit.target: 梦魇

trans-unit.source: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)\nCARDNAME's power and toughness are each equal to the number of Swamps you control.
trans-unit.target: 飞行（此生物只能被具飞行或延势异能的生物阻挡。） CARDNAME的力量和防御力各等同于由你操控的沼泽数量。

trans-unit.source: The thunder of its hooves beats dreams into despair.
trans-unit.target: 它的铁蹄巨响将梦击入绝境。

trans-unit.source: Raise Dead
trans-unit.target: 起死回生

trans-unit.resname: W17·18 | Raise Dead | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
trans-unit.target: 将目标生物牌从你的坟墓场移回你手上。

trans-unit.source: The earth cannot hold that which magic commands.
trans-unit.target: 泥土无法留存魔法驱使之物。

trans-unit.source: Sengir Vampire
trans-unit.target: 辛格氏吸血鬼

trans-unit.resname: W17·19 | Sengir Vampire | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)\nWhenever a creature dealt damage by CARDNAME this turn dies, put a +1/+1 counter on CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: 飞行（此生物只能被具飞行或延势异能的生物阻挡。） 每当一个本回合中曾受到CARDNAME伤害的生物死去时，在CARDNAME上放置一个+1/+1指示物。

trans-unit.source: Empires rise and fall, but evil is eternal.
trans-unit.target: 帝国兴落，邪恶永存。

trans-unit.source: Untamed Hunger
trans-unit.target: 不驯饥渴

trans-unit.resname: W17·20 | Untamed Hunger | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Enchant creature\nEnchanted creature gets +2/+1 and has menace. (It can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)
trans-unit.target: 结附于生物 所结附的生物得+2/+1且具有威慑异能。（它只能被两个或更多生物阻挡。）

trans-unit.source: "Mindlessness is not weakness. When we are lost to hunger we are unstoppable."\n—Drana, Kalastria bloodchief
trans-unit.target: 「失心疯并非弱点。当饥渴遮蔽我们双眼时，我们无人能挡。」 ～卡列奇血侯哲娜

trans-unit.source: Falkenrath Reaver
trans-unit.target: 伐肯纳裂肢兵

trans-unit.source: "Each day there are new reports of homes along Getander Pass and Hofsaddel falling to vampires of a more savage nature. I've even heard tell that Anje Falkenrath has returned. Please send whatever help you can."\n—Sterin Gorn, letter to Thalia
trans-unit.target: 「每天都有新的报告传来，革荡峡和霍夫撒德沿途的住户遭更蛮野的吸血鬼屠戮。我甚至听说安姬伐肯纳已经回归。请尽力派遣援兵。」 ～斯特因戈恩致莎利雅

trans-unit.source: Shivan Dragon
trans-unit.target: 西瓦巨龙

trans-unit.resname: W17·22 | Shivan Dragon | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)\n{R}: CARDNAME gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 飞行（此生物只能被具飞行或延势异能的生物阻挡。） {R}：CARDNAME得+1/+0直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: The undisputed master of the mountains of Shiv.
trans-unit.target: 西瓦山脉无庸置疑的主人。

trans-unit.source: Thundering Giant
trans-unit.target: 雷动巨人

trans-unit.resname: W17·23 | Thundering Giant | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.)
trans-unit.target: 敏捷（此生物受你操控时便能攻击与{T}。）

trans-unit.source: The giant was felt a few seconds before he was seen.
trans-unit.target: 巨人出现前几秒，你就能感觉到他。

trans-unit.source: Garruk's Horde
trans-unit.target: 贾路的兽群

trans-unit.resname: W17·24 | Garruk's Horde | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Trample (This creature can deal excess combat damage to defending player or planeswalker while attacking.)\nPlay with the top card of your library revealed.\nYou may cast the top card of your library if it's a creature card. (Do this only any time you could cast that creature card. You still pay the spell's costs.)
trans-unit.target: 践踏（此生物攻击时造成之过量战斗伤害能对防御牌手或鹏洛客造成之。） 你以展示牌库顶牌的方式进行游戏。 如果你的牌库顶牌是生物牌，你可以施放之。（你只可在自己能施放该生物牌的时机下如此作。你依旧要支付该咒语的费用。）

trans-unit.source: Oakenform
trans-unit.target: 橡树形体

trans-unit.source: Enchant creature\nEnchanted creature gets +3/+3.
trans-unit.target: 结附于生物 所结附的生物得+3/+3。

trans-unit.source: "When the beast cloaks itself in the mighty oak, what good is a bow? When the oak wraps itself around the snarling beast, what good is a hatchet?"\n—Dionus, elvish archdruid
trans-unit.target: 「如果野兽藏身在雄伟橡树中，弓岂能奈他何？如果橡树有咆哮的野兽护身，斧头岂能奈他何？」 ～妖精高位德鲁伊戴欧诺

trans-unit.source: Rabid Bite
trans-unit.target: 狂疾啃咬

trans-unit.resname: W17·26 | Rabid Bite | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Target creature you control deals damage equal to its power to target creature you don't control.
trans-unit.target: 目标由你操控的生物对目标不由你操控的生物造成等同于前者力量的伤害。

trans-unit.source: "You should have seen the look on *both* their faces."\n—Morkamp, Lambholt innkeeper
trans-unit.target: 「你真应该看一下双方脸上的表情。」 ～羊屯旅店主莫坎普

trans-unit.source: Rootwalla
trans-unit.target: 萝特瓦拉

trans-unit.source: {1}{G}: CARDNAME gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Activate this ability only once each turn.
trans-unit.target: {1}{G}：CARDNAME得+2/+2直到回合结束。此异能每回合只能起动一次。

trans-unit.source: They make terrible pets ... unless you don't like your other pets.
trans-unit.target: 它们是极糟糕的宠物...除非你不喜欢你的其他宠物。

trans-unit.source: Stalking Tiger
trans-unit.target: 潜行之虎

trans-unit.resname: W17·28 | Stalking Tiger | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME can't be blocked by more than one creature.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME不能被一个以上的生物阻挡。

trans-unit.source: In the Jamuraan jungles, there is often no separating beauty from danger.
trans-unit.target: 在杰姆拉丛林中，美丽与危险经常集于一体。

trans-unit.source: Stampeding Rhino
trans-unit.target: 狂奔犀牛

trans-unit.resname: W17·29 | Stampeding Rhino | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Trample (This creature can deal excess combat damage to defending player or planeswalker while attacking.)
trans-unit.target: 践踏（此生物攻击时造成之过量战斗伤害能对防御牌手或鹏洛客造成之。）

trans-unit.source: The quickest way to get through the jungle is to agitate a rhino and run in its wake.
trans-unit.target: 穿越丛林的最快方法，是刺激一头犀牛并随其行迹奔跑。

trans-unit.source: Wing Snare
trans-unit.target: 捕鸟网

trans-unit.resname: W17·30 | Wing Snare | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Destroy target creature with flying.
trans-unit.target: 消灭目标具飞行异能的生物。

trans-unit.source: "We are the hands of the great trees, reaching out to ensnare what threatens their branches."\n—Elvish hunter
trans-unit.target: 「我们是大树的手。伸出来捉住威胁树枝之物。」 ～妖精猎人
